name: Jim Hawkins
subtitle: Space Traveler
author: Veronica Di Lorenzo / Livio Cacciatore

additional_info.title: FAQ
additional_info.body:
Q: If I play a location using Jim Hawkins – Space Traveler’s ability This Is It!, can I move him to that location using his Take the Helm ability?
A: Yes. Note that you can do this as soon as either one (or both) comes into play.

flavor_text: You’re gonna rattle the stars, you are. —John Silver
rules_text: THIS IS IT! When you play this character, you may play a location with cost 4 or less for free. TAKE THE HELM Whenever you play a location, this character may move there for free.
